/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. A concrete overpass arches over the street, its sturdy structure a testament to the city's infrastructure. Graffiti adorns the walls of the overpass, adding a touch of urban art to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, illuminating the cityscape with a warm glow.
